title: Can't debug a service
content:
I am working on Lab11-03 in "Practical Malware Analysis" book. The malware I am analyzing trojanized the file 
cisvc.exe
which is the indexing service in Windows XP. After that the malware start the service by running the command 
net start cisvc
. I put a breakpoint before it starts the service: I want to debug the service (cisvc.exe). I opened it in another instance of OllyDbg but I received an exception: There is an option to attach processes but the serivce it currently stopped. I need some way to put a breakpoint in the very beginning of it. Any idea how can I do it ?

answers_data.content:
I solved it by using updated version of OllyDbg => OllyDbg 2.01
I also found another reference that provides another way to solve such problem in the future:
Debugging malware that will only run as a service
